ol.li: SHALL conform to Consol General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Allergies Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] MTM Medication Section (templateId: 111.222.333.444.333)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Other Information Section (templateId: 111.222.333.444.444)
SHALL conform to Consol General Header Constraints template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] realmCode/@code="US" (CONF:5249)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] typeId (CONF:5361)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:5363)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:5253)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:5254)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:5256)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16926 BasicConfidentialityKind STATIC (CONF:5259)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] languageCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11526 Language DYNAMIC (CONF:5372)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] setId (CONF:5261)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] versionNumber (CONF:5264)
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] recordTarget (CONF:5266)
The recordTarget records the patient whose health information is described by the clinical document; it must contain at least one patientRole element.
MAY contain exactly one [1..1] componentOf (CONF:9955)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] author (CONF:5444)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] dataEnterer (CONF:5441)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] custodian (iv., CONF:5519)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] informationRecipient (CONF:5565)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] legalAuthenticator (CONF:5579)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] authenticator (CONF:5607)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informant (CONF:8001)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] supportParticipant (CONF:10003)
MAY contain zero or more [0..*] inFulfillmentOf (CONF:9952)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Consol Allergies Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.6.1)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] MTM Medication Section (templateId: 111.222.333.444.333)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] component
Contains exactly one [1..1] Other Information Section (templateId: 111.222.333.444.444)
